thread.title: England team and Wembley fans pay tribute to victims of London terror attack with a minute’s silence ahead of Lithuania clash

author: sstreet
title: England team and Wembley fans pay tribute to victims of London terror attack with a minute’s silence ahead of Lithuania clash
text:
EFL Mark of respect England team and Wembley fans pay tribute to victims of London terror attack with a minute’s silence ahead of Lithuania clash 
Wembley lowers England flag next to the Bobby Moore statue in memory of those who lost their lives in Westminster on Wednesday By Sam Street 26th March 2017, 4:59 pm Updated: 27th March 2017, 1:00 am
